meanings.definition: Acting or done in the same way over time
meanings.sent1: Her consistent practice every morning helped her improve.
meanings.sent2: The team's consistent performance led them to victory.
meanings.sent3: It was consistent how he always wore mismatched socks.
meanings.sent4: The consistent rainfall turned the dry land into a lush garden.
meanings.sent5: The consistent ticking of the clock filled the room with a sense of calm.

meanings.definition: Compatible or in agreement with something
meanings.sent1: Their tastes in music were consistent, so they enjoyed listening together.
meanings.sent2: The color palette of the room was consistent with the overall theme.
meanings.sent3: It was consistent how their opinions always aligned perfectly.
meanings.sent4: Her actions were consistent with her words, showing her integrity.
meanings.sent5: The consistent flow of traffic made the commute smooth and easy.

meanings.sent1: The glue provided a consistent bond between the pieces.
meanings.sent2: The team showed consistent unity during the challenging project.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle pieces fit together in a consistent manner.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was consistent, never faltering even in tough times.
meanings.sent5: The consistent structure of the building made it sturdy and reliable.
